comments.body: I wanted to use the ``ids=`` argument for the fixture here as you suggested but I'm finding it difficult to come up with useful and succinct ID strings for each of the 22 test cases. Many of the cases are essentially testing the same behaviour so I found I was repeating the same ID string. Do you think I should still try to include the ``ids=`` or just exclude them?
